homepageWelcomeDescription: A new era of community-driven forums with direct democracy. Your voice shapes our space.
homepageAgoraDescription: Participate in binding votations, propose new initiatives, and contribute to the governance of Kratia. Your vote matters here.
errorLoadingForumsMessage: Could not load forum categories. Ensure Firestore is set up and has data, or try seeding.
noForumCategoriesInfo: It looks like no categories have been set up yet. Check back later or contact an administrator.
seedDatabaseDescription: If this is a new setup or your database is empty, click here to populate it with mock data. This button will disappear after successful seeding.
databaseSeededMessage: Database has been seeded. Refresh if data isn't showing.
